word: Then I saw the Lord look lovingly upon you. I saw the Life-giver come and your wife and children come forth from their graves clothed with immortal splendor. Look at the things which are unseen. . . . May God bless and encourage your heart, is my prayer. Your sympathizing sister, (signed) Ellen G. White.--Letter 71, 1878. (To J. N. Andrews, December 5, 1878.)
